column4: My live CD doesn't seem to be able to start X on my PIII laptop to install. Might I be able to install 5.10 and upgrade with apt?
Anybody? Will upgrading 5.10 yield the exact same OS as installing dapper?
I just upgraded from breezy to dapper yesterday... no problems.
The only thing to keep in mind is that if you are using certain packages that have been phased out in Dapper, then you'll have a problem.
